projects.title: ASSET
projects.description: A model validation experiment launched into 0g on the Blue origin New Shepard rocket. I designed a flight event based, multi-device, reactive, control system to preform a precise and repeatable collection of data.

projects.title: LDC1101 Driver
projects.description: A driver for the Texas Instruments LDC1101 inductive sensing chip. This driver was designed to be used in a real time embedded system. It is written in C and uses the TI MSP430 microcontroller.

projects.title: Balboa Bot
projects.description: A ROS based robot that uses computer vision to follow a ball. The robot is built on a Pololu Balboa 32u4 robot chassis. The computer vision is done using OpenCV and the ROS image pipeline.
